title: Notifications of deaths of residents related to COVID-19 in adult care homes
description: Notifications to Care Inspectorate Wales of deaths of residents related to COVID-19 in adult care homes during the coronavirus pandemic
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll to the latest release, this will open another page scroll to data and click on the + the spreadsheet can be found here

Notification Date.description: Date of notification of death by the care home provider, not necessarily the date of death.

Cause of Death.description: Cause of death is reported by the care home provider and not necessarily based on laboratory confirmed tests, so is not directly comparable with Public Health Wales data.

sizingNotes: Simple table structure although different formats across 7 tabs
